name: Ran Off
description:
My game for Epita GGames Jam as a one man team.
It's an hommage to OFF and its amazing soundtrack and art style.

I also seeked inspirations from games such as Mario Odyssey, Ghost Trick, and The Other.

This is also an experiment as I mess with synced actions to audio via tags. Didn't work as well as I wanted it to, but it gets the job done.

I would have loved to be able to make more levels with more of OFF's OST, but I just didn't have the time, so I tried to make each level unique in its gameplay.
